Misc.

Acosta v. Texas. Clyde W. Woódy and Mariam, S. Rosen for petitioner. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, George M. Cowden, First Assistant Attorney. General, R. L. Lattimore, Howard M. Fender and Lonny F. Zwie-ner, Assistant Attorneys General, and A. J. Cambbi, Jr., for respondent.
